summary:
This mod adds a spell, and a book. The book can be found at the Riverwood Trader, in Riverwood.
For future downloads, I refer you to the -All version. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27526

I will only be updating that one. Please download that instead. New corrected version uploaded to it now.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a spell, and a book. The book can be found at the Riverwood Trader, in Riverwood.

Buy the book, read it, and you gain a spell that allows you to transmute iron into salt. Make sure to use ore and not ingots.

Special thanks to steve40 and Ghaunadaur for helping me create the script.

For future downloads, I refer you to the -All version. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27526

I will only be updating that one. Please download that instead. New corrected version uploaded to it now.

Requires SKSE.
author: Hadoumastery
